data.description: Develop lesson and unit plans, appropriate assessments, and understand what it means to teach social studies for democratic citizenship. Make connections between educational theory and the use of different pedagogical strategies, and be able to critically evaluate and discuss the assigned journal articles and book chapters.
data.title: TEACHING OF HISTORY AND THE OTHER SOCIAL STUDIES

data.description: Explore research and practice on topics such as social studies instruction for diverse pupils, critical thinking, and authentic assessment.
data.title: ADVANCED PRACTICES IN THE TEACHING OF SOCIAL STUDIES
